actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the Idaho Wilderness, Boise, Challis, Payette, and Salmon National Forests, Idaho and the Salmon River Wilderness, Bitterroot, Nezperce, and Salmon National Forests, Idaho.

summary.text: Designates specified lands as the Idaho Wilderness in the Boise, Challis, Payette, and Salmon National Forests, Idaho. Designates specified lands as the Salmon River Wilderness in the Bitterroot, Nezperce, and Salmon National Forests, Idaho.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Idaho Wilderness, Boise, Challis, Payette, and Salmon National Forests, Idaho and the Salmon River Wilderness, Bitterroot, Nezperce, and Salmon National Forests, Idaho.
